author: protolambda
content: <@!467641904247341067>  Ah cool. Quick note; if you like to get into the trust of the chain, consider explaining (maybe in a future article) the difference between GHOST and most-work. Different approaches to judging a sequence of blocks, and different between Eth2 and others. Another explainer of LMD-GHOST is https://vitalik.ca/general/2018/12/05/cbc_casper.html, but it's older and could use a new view. And then recently there was the "complete" but harder to read paper describing "gasper", which would be nice to have a surface view article of.
